sense.def:
An average
je izid, ki ga dobimo, kadar seštejemo več zneskov in seštevek delimo s številom zneskov.

seg.quote: These pupils were examined in 39 subjects, an average of 6.5 subjects for each pupil.
The average age of the group was thirty-nine years.

sense.def:
To average a particular amount
pomeni, da tista količina velja kot povprečje v določenem času.

seg.quote: Price increases during these years averaged around 20%.

sense.def:
Kar je
average
, je značilno za normalno velikost ali kakovost.

seg.quote: ...a sheet of paper of average thickness.
Their language development is below average.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
on average
, hočemo povedati, da je določeno število povprečje več števil.

seg.quote: We can discover how many words, on average, a person reads in a minute.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
averages out a set of numbers
, izračuna povprečje vrste števil.
